programme.title: Love 911

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: When Peppy invites Branch to go on a Swag Stag hunt, Branch is nervous and invents a tall tale that he must keep up with/DJ Suki confesses that she's nervous to throw a party so Poppy suggests she join the Party Crash Course

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and his underwater friends race around an obstacle course, but Cruz gets sucked into a whirlpool. As each of them try to rescue him, they are sucked in! Kelp saves them all using his unicorn spark to create bubbles he attaches to seaweed. / Kelp helps his unicorn friends create music with their horns and pieces of nature. Ollie is embarrassed by the sound of his horn.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Cruz decides to turn the sunken ship into a park. But all his and Kelp’s “fun-crastinating” puts the project in jeopardy. / Kelp accidentally knocks a boulder into the stream, blocking the flow while trying his unicorn spark. Frustrated by magic, Kelp uses the narwhal way.

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: One of Tag’s biggest dreams is to be a contestant on her favorite TV game show: The Pawmazing Race, hosted by Kelly Korgi. Which is why she entered her entire family to compete in the family edition! And now that dream is finally coming true! / The Barker Family continue their quest to become the winners of The Pawmazing Race. But the challenges only get tougher from here on out. Tag learns that her family’s quirky traits can help them through any obstacle.

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: Today is Yarn Ball Day, a special day in the cat-filled town of Meowbuquerque. Unfortunately, the bridge leading to the party is broken. With time ticking, Tag, Scooch, and Kit work together at getting the cats across to the party. / When The Barkapellas announce that they’re cancelling their biggest concert ever, Tag is determined to figure out why in order to get them back on stage. But with a stadium full of impatient fans, Tag is going to have to work fast.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! Team Zenko must help Rodney face his fear of the dark so he can get the last picture for his collection.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: Donna plans a garden party for Rona, but the only problem is that her garden is overgrown and neglected. The team try to transform this jungle into a backyard just in time for the party. / Lula finds an angry goose on the loose, and Team Zenko need to get it out of the park before soccer camp starts.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: The Rescue Riders get stuck in a cave with their rival, Magnus, during a race to find a new source of an important mineral.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Frustrated that she's not fitting in with the team, Aggro goes off on her own with Elbone on a mission to save a dragon egg trapped in ice.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and Blade's personalities clash as they track Klaus and Veruca and fight off some of Po's old foes. Blade gets to see Po's kung fu mastery, but doesn't agree to team up with him until she realizes that he accidentally holds the key to finding Klaus and Veruca: he has a piece of the WuGao Gauntlet. Meanwhile, Klaus and Veruca continue on their path of destruction while looking for the mysterious "Lotus".

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po's moral lines are blurred when he and Blade have to break an untrustworthy hedgehog monk (Zhen) out of jail to get more information on what Klaus and Veruca stole from the Lotus. They learn from Zhen that there are in fact three more weapons, and Po recognizes one of them from a comic book.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: When the Senior Puss Squad is in trouble and needs his help, Puss is alone in the woods trying to survive an unknown assassin's dangerous attack

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: When Dulcinea sets up a school to teach unruly thieves how to be good, Uli takes the idea too far and it's up to Puss to make San Lorenzo normal

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: Soon-to-be-big sister Lucky “borrows” Snips for a day to see what it’s like to have a little sibling, but nothing goes as planned

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: The frontier gets a chill when Lucky, Spirit and the PALs attempt to rescue a missing girl

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Branch bets Guy and Smidge that he can complete his Bunker List in one day/Satin and Chenille get the chance to intern for their idol Nova Swift

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Leroy must learn to let go when his caterpillar friend turns into a butterfly. / When Pixie loses her spark, Kelp and Juniper look for the plant they think will cure her. Meanwhile Pixie wonders whether she can be cured at all!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag is frustrated living in a crowded house, and Scooch is bored in a quiet house, the two friends switch houses for the day. At first they both love their new lives. But as Scooch gets overwhelmed by all the activity at The Barker house, and Tag gets bored by the quiet life at the Pooch’s, they eagerly switch back before the day is done. \ When the Pawston Get Sox go on a losing streak, Tag and Scooch come up with the idea to have a team mascot. And Frank and Beans are the perfect fit! But when the two mascots start to clash over who gets the spotlight, Tag has to help save their friendship, and the big game!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Donna is dog sitting but unable to sleep due to barking, TZG secretly stops a skunk from sneaking into her yard at night and riling the pooch. / When an inexperienced Rona takes over as chairman of the Founder’s Day Celebration, TZG secretly helps ensure the traditional festivities run smoothly.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When a mama Ironclaw dragon gets caught high on a mountain with a broken wing, Hannahr the blacksmith has to confront her fear of heights to help out.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: On the Volcano Island, Po and the Kids are reunited with Li, Grandma, Ping, Rooster, Wing, and Wong, and work together to find out what's really going on the island. Xiao becomes suspicious of some of her royal workers.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Following the events of the feature, Yi struggles to recreate her violin magic without Everest. While her mom and NaiNai prepare for the grand opening of their family dumpling shop, Yi, Jin, and Peng discover that Yi’s violin has attracted a magical bird-like creature, Fenghuang, who needs their help. Yi’s music also calls on Everest, who returns to join the crew and find Fenghuang a suitable home.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yi’s magic works, they notice that Everest isn’t looking too hot. In fact, he’s too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help. Out of options, Yi tries to use her magic to send Everest home – until Burnish and his jerboa sidekick, Duchess, reveal that they’ve made over the kids’ rooftop fort into a high-tech HQ, complete with various tech gadgets for the crew and a temperature-controlled chamber for Everest.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: When the town’s well runs dry, Hiccup and Toothless discover a group of baby Whispering Death dragons living in the tunnels underneath, planted there by Alvin.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Snotlout is concerned when his dragon’s flame goes out and the kids have to figure out how to reignite it before it’s too late.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Once every 10 years, a mysterious glowing dragon visits Berk and this year Hiccup and Astrid are determined to find out where it's coming from – and stop it from reaching the village.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Our team’s startup company and their rivals at Baby Corp get in a “Space Race”, competing to see who can make the cutest kiddie-pretend “moon landing” for a baby – a spectacle sure to bring in a bounty of Baby Love. With both companies pouring their resources into a simulated space take off, tempers and sabotage are running hot, and the scrappy little startup is in danger of getting crushed by their big business competitor.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: JJ reluctantly lets Tina take over her assistant duties for the day, but a Tina slip-up leads to an outbreak of town adults drinking diluted special formula that makes them all baby-brained. When JJ discovers this, she works with R & D Baby Simmons and Security Baby Katja to antidote the wobbling “Adult Babies” before Tina can find out and blame herself.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Crispin Biscuits frames Boss and Tina’s startup company for exploding baby Iggy’s favorite stuffed animal, and Tina is forced to the sidelines to avoid any more bad press. As Crispin expands his plan to burst all the plush toys in the neighborhood, Tina discovers she can stop this by breaking open and rewiring a single toy doll. Unfortunately that doll is Baby Corp’s current head honcho, Pull-String CEO Baby.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Sharzod hates feeling indebted to Tip after being rescued and tries to get "even"; Police King Kyle must solve the case of Sharzod's missing mojo.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: Smoove Move goes from underground street artist to world-famous pedicurist and lets his newfound fame go to his head. // Thieving hermit crabs steal the crew's shells, so they concoct an elaborate heist to get them back.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: A fierce windstorm traps the gang inside the garage and they have fun together all night, but once the food runs out they team up to find a way out.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: Wally, Wenda and Wizard Whitebeard visit a fellow Wizard in Mumbai to take part in a big Bollywood dance number. But when Odlulu uses the Follow-the-Leader Key to lead all the dancers away in order to dance with her, it’s up to the Wanderers to get the key AND the dancers back

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: It's Chris Beacon's birthday and he's looking forward to spending the day onshore and having a party at the village hall. Pat's SDS mission is to pick up all the presents from everyone who won't be able to be at the party later. The kids and Lauren are working on decorating the village hall and making Ben a big card from them all whilst Nisha and Ajay provide special birthday cakes for Chris and Micawber and Alf and Dorothy send over lovely fresh eggs and cheese and a special homemade woolly jumper. Meanwhile, the weather is getting worse out at Pencaster Lighthouse and Chris realises, sadly, that he'll have to stay and man the lighthouse and make sure that the passing boats are protected. He won't be able to join everyone for his birthday after all! But Pat has a great idea – if Chris can't come to the birthday party, the birthday party can come to him! With the help of the SDS helicopter Pat delivers all of Chris's birthday presents directly to him at the lighthouse! Everyone contacts Chris by video conference so that even if they can't be there, he's not alone on his birthday! Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa has decided that the jingly jangly jungle is not jingly or jangly enough. He and his friends make lots of noise, but soon learn that they need to work together to make a wonderful jingly jangly jungle noise.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: All the toys in Toyland are visiting Fuse's workshop for a toy check but something is wrong! Toys are fine before the check and wonky after! Noddy investigates why toys are going wonky so that he can help them return to normal quickly. With the help of his wwwbook and following all the clues Noddy works out that Fuse has given himself a robot upgrade to help him do the toy checks quickly but he installed it incorrectly. That's why he's been making the toys go wonky! Noddy helps Fuse uninstall the upgrade and soon everyone is back to normal. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Diggly is bored of the same old scraps every day. Fifi and Bumble decide to make him a pumpkin pie as a surprise. But there's no flour left to make the pastry, what will they use instead?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: The kids scare away a swarm of bees. But when they realize bees make the flowers happy, they hatch a plan to get them back! / When Scallop makes a bad choice, Kelp helps her learn from her mistakes.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: After Burple and Cutter crash-land in a village of tiny dragons, Burple's unintentional act of courage leads the locals to crown him as their king.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and team go to the city of Tikal to get more information on the Protector, but it's easier said than done, since nobody in the town actually knows the identity of the Protector. Blade becomes increasingly frustrated and Po attempts to help her.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: When Frederic Estes tries to get babies banned from the local library, the babies fight back in a war for story time

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his “big bad” year on the zodiac calendar – which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: The gang competes to see who can best train a Terrible Terror, while Alvin is closing in on Berk.

programme.title: Office Uprising
programme.desc: A laid-back worker and his co-workers at a weapons factory must fight for their lives when a military energy drink turns their fellow employees into zombies.

programme.title: Eastern Condors
programme.desc: A daring commando raid into Vietnam to destroy a munitions dump left behind by American marines.

programme.title: Molly'S Game
programme.desc: The true story of Molly Bloom, an Olympic-class skier who ran the world's most exclusive high-stakes poker game and became an FBI target.

programme.title: Suicide Forest Village
programme.desc: One day a mysterious box arrived and a curse began to spread all over. The source of the box is 'Jukai Village'. The village is hidden in Jukai Forest, a suicide spot that once you enter it, you can never come out.

programme.title: Confidential Assignment 2: International
programme.desc: The film depicts an unpredictable global cooperative investigation by South Korean, North Korean, and American detectives who have come together for their own purposes.

programme.title: Pawn
programme.desc: A drama about a man who would do anything for money becoming friends with a child who is then taken hostage.

programme.title: Battle Creek Brawl
programme.desc: A young Asian-American martial artist is forced to participate in a brutal formal street-fighting competition.

programme.title: Death Forest
programme.desc: The students of a school go on a trip not knowing what's in there can I survive The mysterious ghost of the forest and just like that it's a bloody massacre.

programme.title: The Anchor
programme.desc: Se-Ra is a famous anchor on a broadcasting station. Five minutes before her news broadcast is to go live, she receives a phone call. The caller, Mi-So, tells Se-Ra: "I am going to be killed by someone. Please cover the story of my death."

programme.title: Wind River
programme.desc: A veteran hunter helps an FBI agent investigate the murder of a young woman on a Wyoming Native American reservation.

programme.title: Miracle: Letters To The President
programme.desc: Dreaming of making a train station for his sister and the villagers, Joon-kyung sends many letters to the president, but with no reply. Ra-hee, who has a crush on Joon-kyung, does everything she can to help him meet the president.

programme.title: Isabelle
programme.desc: A young couple's dream of starting a family shatters as they descend into the depths of paranoia and must struggle to survive an evil presence that wants nothing more than their very own lives.

programme.title: The Moviemakers
programme.desc: Since the early 1990s, Quentin Tarantino has been on a cinematic rollercoaster ride, that’s never looked like slowing down, that has cemented himself as one of the worlds most influential filmmakers.

programme.title: The Moviemakers
programme.desc: Spike Lee has always been a controversial and political filmmaker whose films speak for themselves. Over 40 years since his debut in the world of film, Spike continues to push boundaries in America.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan
programme.desc: Mena restaurant-hops with friends Lilly Singh and Laura Marano, indulging in plant-based French pastries, "pastrami" sammies, Thai "chicken" wings and "carne" asada.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan
programme.desc: A diverse group of chefs create mouth-watering plant-based dumplings, fried `chik'n' sandwiches and Vietnamese `catfish'; Mena forages for lobster mushrooms and visits the oldest tofu factory in America.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan
programme.desc: Mena explores his Canadian backyard, discovering delicious plant-based sushi, pistachio cannolis, and pizza; he gets hands-on at a vegan cheese factory with comedian Bassem Youssef.

programme.title: Around The World With Manu Feildel
programme.desc: Manu heads to Hong Kong, the fourth country on his around the world tour, and he has some great food excursions lined up. Chicken feet, Tim Ho Wan, street food and lots to fit in before he jumps across the pond to Tokyo, Japan.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam's journey to explore China's history through its food continues, as he visits the provinces of Jiangsu and Zhejiang, both considered part of the 8 great regional cuisines of China and celebrated for their wealth and sophistication.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives in one of the largest cities in the world Shanghai where he discovers a modern, cosmopolitan and global facing city.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: On his journey discovering China's history through its food, Adam arrives in Shandong - birthplace of Confucius and one of the oldest and most influential culinary traditions in China.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives in one of the most fascinating Chinese provinces - Yunnan. Infused with spice and fragrance from Southeast and Central Asia, people from all around China have fallen in love with this cuisine and culture.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan
programme.desc: Mena restaurant-hops with friends Lilly Singh and Laura Marano, indulging in plant-based French pastries, "pastrami" sammies, Thai "chicken" wings and "carne" asada.

programme.title: The Lost Tapes S2
programme.desc: Rediscover the Tet Offensive: two months of battles that killed more than 15,000 American and Allied troops, and triggered anti-war protests across the U.S. Explore reports, images, and combat footage, much of which hasn’t been seen since 1968.

programme.title: The Lost Tapes S2
programme.desc: Experience a chronological recounting of the Apollo 13 near-disaster, one of NASA’s most devastating—and finest—moments. Witness the events of April 1970 as they unfolded through news footage, mission control audio, and NASA archives.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: Auckland Zoo’s primate team prepare to welcome a new birth.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: Auckland Zoo’s vet team commences critical care to save the life of an endangered sea turtle snared on a fishing line, and after 3 years without tigers at the Zoo, the team stand by to welcome a new big cat.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: We follow Auckland Zoo’s bird team into the wilds of the Coromandel Ranges as they help to save native kiwi populations, It’s a feeding frenzy for the Tasmanian devils and the elephant team faces their biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: This time on Wild Heroes, there's shocking news for the elephant team, the vets are concerned about one of their rescued Little penguins, and we find out how it really does take a community to feed the Zoo.

programme.title: Destination Myanmar
programme.desc: Destination Myanmar will take the audience to some of Myanmar's most beautiful and stunning Asian Heritage wetlands with fishermen paddling one-legged along shallow waters and floating gardens.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Cruz decides to turn the sunken ship into a park. But all his and Kelp’s “fun-crastinating” puts the project in jeopardy. / Kelp accidentally knocks a boulder into the stream, blocking the flow while trying his unicorn spark. Frustrated by magic, Kelp uses the narwhal way.

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: One of Tag’s biggest dreams is to be a contestant on her favorite TV game show: The Pawmazing Race, hosted by Kelly Korgi. And now that dream is finally coming true! / The Barker Family continue their quest to become the winners of The Pawmazing Race. But the challenges only get tougher from here on out. Tag learns that her family’s quirky traits can help them through any obstacle.

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: Today is Yarn Ball Day, a special day in the cat-filled town of Meowbuquerque. Unfortunately, the bridge leading to the party is broken. With time ticking, Tag, Scooch, and Kit work together at getting the cats across to the party. / When The Barkapellas announce that they’re cancelling their biggest concert ever, Tag is determined to figure out why in order to get them back on stage. But with a stadium full of impatient fans, Tag is going to have to work fast.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! Team Zenko must help Rodney face his fear of the dark so he can get the last picture for his collection.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: Donna plans a garden party for Rona, but the only problem is that her garden is overgrown and neglected. The team try to transform this jungle into a backyard just in time for the party. / Lula finds an angry goose on the loose, and Team Zenko need to get it out of the park before soccer camp starts.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: The Rescue Riders get stuck in a cave with their rival, Magnus, during a race to find a new source of an important mineral.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Frustrated that she's not fitting in with the team, Aggro goes off on her own with Elbone on a mission to save a dragon egg trapped in ice.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and Blade's personalities clash as they track Klaus and Veruca and fight off some of Po's old foes. Blade gets to see Po's kung fu mastery, but doesn't agree to team up with him until she realizes that he accidentally holds the key to finding Klaus and Veruca: he has a piece of the WuGao Gauntlet. Meanwhile, Klaus and Veruca continue on their path of destruction while looking for the mysterious "Lotus".

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po's moral lines are blurred when he and Blade have to break an untrustworthy hedgehog monk (Zhen) out of jail to get more information on what Klaus and Veruca stole from the Lotus. They learn from Zhen that there are in fact three more weapons, and Po recognizes one of them from a comic book.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: When the Senior Puss Squad is in trouble and needs his help, Puss is alone in the woods trying to survive an unknown assassin's dangerous attack

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: When Dulcinea sets up a school to teach unruly thieves how to be good, Uli takes the idea too far and it's up to Puss to make San Lorenzo normal

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: Soon-to-be-big sister Lucky “borrows” Snips for a day to see what it’s like to have a little sibling, but nothing goes as planned

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: The frontier gets a chill when Lucky, Spirit and the PALs attempt to rescue a missing girl

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Branch bets Guy and Smidge that he can complete his Bunker List in one day/Satin and Chenille get the chance to intern for their idol Nova Swift

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Leroy must learn to let go when his caterpillar friend turns into a butterfly. / When Pixie loses her spark, Kelp and Juniper look for the plant they think will cure her. Meanwhile Pixie wonders whether she can be cured at all!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag is frustrated living in a crowded house, and Scooch is bored in a quiet house, the two friends switch houses for the day. At first they both love their new lives. But as Scooch gets overwhelmed by all the activity at The Barker house, and Tag gets bored by the quiet life at the Pooch’s, they eagerly switch back before the day is done. \ When the Pawston Get Sox go on a losing streak, Tag and Scooch come up with the idea to have a team mascot. And Frank and Beans are the perfect fit! But when the two mascots start to clash over who gets the spotlight, Tag has to help save their friendship, and the big game!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Donna is dog sitting but unable to sleep due to barking, TZG secretly stops a skunk from sneaking into her yard at night and riling the pooch. / When an inexperienced Rona takes over as chairman of the Founder’s Day Celebration, TZG secretly helps ensure the traditional festivities run smoothly.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When a mama Ironclaw dragon gets caught high on a mountain with a broken wing, Hannahr the blacksmith has to confront her fear of heights to help out.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: On the Volcano Island, Po and the Kids are reunited with Li, Grandma, Ping, Rooster, Wing, and Wong, and work together to find out what's really going on the island. Xiao becomes suspicious of some of her royal workers.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Following the events of the feature, Yi struggles to recreate her violin magic without Everest. While her mom and NaiNai prepare for the grand opening of their family dumpling shop, Yi, Jin, and Peng discover that Yi’s violin has attracted a magical bird-like creature, Fenghuang, who needs their help. Yi’s music also calls on Everest, who returns to join the crew and find Fenghuang a suitable home.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yi’s magic works, they notice that Everest isn’t looking too hot. In fact, he’s too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help. Out of options, Yi tries to use her magic to send Everest home – until Burnish and his jerboa sidekick, Duchess, reveal that they’ve made over the kids’ rooftop fort into a high-tech HQ, complete with various tech gadgets for the crew and a temperature-controlled chamber for Everest.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: When the town’s well runs dry, Hiccup and Toothless discover a group of baby Whispering Death dragons living in the tunnels underneath, planted there by Alvin.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Snotlout is concerned when his dragon’s flame goes out and the kids have to figure out how to reignite it before it’s too late.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Once every 10 years, a mysterious glowing dragon visits Berk and this year Hiccup and Astrid are determined to find out where it's coming from – and stop it from reaching the village.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Our team’s startup company and their rivals at Baby Corp get in a “Space Race”, competing to see who can make the cutest kiddie-pretend “moon landing” for a baby – a spectacle sure to bring in a bounty of Baby Love. With both companies pouring their resources into a simulated space take off, tempers and sabotage are running hot, and the scrappy little startup is in danger of getting crushed by their big business competitor.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: JJ reluctantly lets Tina take over her assistant duties for the day, but a Tina slip-up leads to an outbreak of town adults drinking diluted special formula that makes them all baby-brained. When JJ discovers this, she works with R & D Baby Simmons and Security Baby Katja to antidote the wobbling “Adult Babies” before Tina can find out and blame herself.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Crispin Biscuits frames Boss and Tina’s startup company for exploding baby Iggy’s favorite stuffed animal, and Tina is forced to the sidelines to avoid any more bad press. As Crispin expands his plan to burst all the plush toys in the neighborhood, Tina discovers she can stop this by breaking open and rewiring a single toy doll. Unfortunately that doll is Baby Corp’s current head honcho, Pull-String CEO Baby.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: Smoove Move goes from underground street artist to world-famous pedicurist and lets his newfound fame go to his head. // Thieving hermit crabs steal the crew's shells, so they concoct an elaborate heist to get them back.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: A fierce windstorm traps the gang inside the garage and they have fun together all night, but once the food runs out they team up to find a way out.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: Wally, Wenda and Wizard Whitebeard visit a fellow Wizard in Mumbai to take part in a big Bollywood dance number. But when Odlulu uses the Follow-the-Leader Key to lead all the dancers away in order to dance with her, it’s up to the Wanderers to get the key AND the dancers back

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: It's Chris Beacon's birthday and he's looking forward to spending the day onshore and having a party at the village hall. Pat's SDS mission is to pick up all the presents from everyone who won't be able to be at the party later. The kids and Lauren are working on decorating the village hall and making Ben a big card from them all whilst Nisha and Ajay provide special birthday cakes for Chris and Micawber and Alf and Dorothy send over lovely fresh eggs and cheese and a special homemade woolly jumper. Meanwhile, the weather is getting worse out at Pencaster Lighthouse and Chris realises, sadly, that he'll have to stay and man the lighthouse and make sure that the passing boats are protected. He won't be able to join everyone for his birthday after all! But Pat has a great idea – if Chris can't come to the birthday party, the birthday party can come to him! With the help of the SDS helicopter Pat delivers all of Chris's birthday presents directly to him at the lighthouse! Everyone contacts Chris by video conference so that even if they can't be there, he's not alone on his birthday! Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa has decided that the jingly jangly jungle is not jingly or jangly enough. He and his friends make lots of noise, but soon learn that they need to work together to make a wonderful jingly jangly jungle noise.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: All the toys in Toyland are visiting Fuse's workshop for a toy check but something is wrong! Toys are fine before the check and wonky after! Noddy investigates why toys are going wonky so that he can help them return to normal quickly. With the help of his wwwbook and following all the clues Noddy works out that Fuse has given himself a robot upgrade to help him do the toy checks quickly but he installed it incorrectly. That's why he's been making the toys go wonky! Noddy helps Fuse uninstall the upgrade and soon everyone is back to normal. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Diggly is bored of the same old scraps every day. Fifi and Bumble decide to make him a pumpkin pie as a surprise. But there's no flour left to make the pastry, what will they use instead?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: The kids scare away a swarm of bees. But when they realize bees make the flowers happy, they hatch a plan to get them back! / When Scallop makes a bad choice, Kelp helps her learn from her mistakes.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: After Burple and Cutter crash-land in a village of tiny dragons, Burple's unintentional act of courage leads the locals to crown him as their king.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and team go to the city of Tikal to get more information on the Protector, but it's easier said than done, since nobody in the town actually knows the identity of the Protector. Blade becomes increasingly frustrated and Po attempts to help her.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: When Frederic Estes tries to get babies banned from the local library, the babies fight back in a war for story time

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his “big bad” year on the zodiac calendar – which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: The gang competes to see who can best train a Terrible Terror, while Alvin is closing in on Berk.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: The Trolls try to entertain and win over Archer Pastry with a series of Troll stories/When a rainbow over Troll Village begins to experience a catastrophic breakdown, Cloud Guy arrives in the village to offer his assistance

programme.title: My Only One
programme.desc: A woman's life gets twisted one day because of her biological father who shows up after 28 years of absence. He had been thoroughly hiding his identity, afraid that he might be an obstacle in his daughter's life. The father and daughter meet the "only ones" in their lives and put back together the pieces of their broken hearts.

programme.title: Two Days and One Night 4
programme.desc: Two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all the corners of Korea! Instead of fancy studio, this on-the-road reality show takes place in the rural sides. While over 10 million Koreans travel abroad each year, the "2 Days and 1 Night" casts travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of our neighbors and the beautiful nature that cleanse our eyes.

programme.title: The Return of Superman
programme.desc: Parenting challenges of "Superman,” the first hero that children encounter when they are born.

programme.title: My Neighbor, Charles
programme.desc: Foreigners, leaving their homelands behind, have come all the way to new country, South Korea. They chose South Korea not for sightseeing or short-term stay. But, they are here for various reasons, such as work, study or even marriage. The real stories of foreigners who challenge themselves to survive in Korean society will be unfolded!

programme.title: Music Bank
programme.desc: The best tunes in Korea! the most sensational music show on TV satisfies all your senses! Fantastic performances and Awe-inspiring harmony by the nation's top musicians! Follow the latest trend in the Korean music scene through the K-chart, a summary of the week's hottest songs.

programme.title: Queen of Mystery Season 2
programme.desc: Queen of Mystery is back! Housewife-turned-investigator Seolok and passionate detective Wanseung collaborate to solve mysterious cases and cure the hearts of those who were wounded by crimes along the way.

programme.title: Good Luck!
programme.desc: A life story of three friends, one who is rich, one who is poor, and one who wishes to be rich, along with their families.

programme.title: Cinderella Game
programme.desc: A story of a woman who realizes the meaning of true revenge while she has been used as a fake daughter by her enemy.

programme.title: Villains Everywhere
programme.desc: A comedy drama about wild and sometimes heart-warming daily lives of the Korean housewife sisters and their family.

programme.title: Stars' Top Recipe at Fun-Staurant
programme.desc: Gourmet celebrities team up to explore the world of convenience stores and share their secret recipes!

programme.title: The Slave Hunters
programme.desc: Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!! Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions. After reading a secret message saying the life of Sohyeons youngest son is on the line, Taeha tries to escape in an attempt to save him, the eldest son of the Crown Prince. Daegil, however, gets wind of his plan and the two ends up fighting a bloody fight. Having barely escaped from the fierce fight, Taeha happens to accompany a woman named Hyewon. Daegil fails to track down the slave he was first assigned to capture, and constantly runs into Seolhwa who escaped from a troupe of strolling actors. To make things worse, Daegil is threatened to be killed by a group of slaves who formed a hit squad to assassinate nobles. As for Daegil, he has every reason to be successful in accomplishing his first mission. Aside from recovering his pride hurt by Taeha, Daegil needs a sizable sum of money to live a comfortable life in his old age. In the end, Taeha manages to run away from Daegil while Daegil feels affection for Hyewon.

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Iron Squad 2
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean military survival show brings eight Special Force units together to compete in extreme missions that will test their physical stamina, mental strength and teamwork. Top male reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle till the end in front of five celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Jason's Table: Masterful Dishes
programme.desc: Taiwanese cuisine boasts wide variations of chicken soup, and Chef A-lin has a special recipe. Learn more about how Chef A-lin creates the most complex flavor with the most elegant approach.

programme.title: How to Live Your Best Death
programme.desc: Kristin feels like she's going nowhere in life, so she hires Ashley, a life coach who promises to help Kristin reach her potential. But a shocking discovery reveals that Ashley isn't who she says she is.

programme.title: Nanny Dearest
programme.desc: After receiving fertile eggs from a donor, Rebecca and Caleb conceive a child. Years later, a strange woman appears, oddly drawn to their daughter. Their donor has returned - and she wants what is hers.

programme.title: The Girl Who Wasn't Dead
programme.desc: This is the story of 15-year-old Erica who vanished without a trace. Authorities believed Erica may have been the victim of a local serial killer, but her mother, Carrie refused to believe the worst.

programme.title: Haunted Scotland (S1)
programme.desc: By day, Castle Menzies is the scene of romantic beauty, but by night, dark forces push out any unwitting visitors.

programme.title: Beyond The Unknown (S3)
programme.desc: Don Wildman investigates an ominous warning from beyond the grave, uncovers a mammoth mystery that sprung from the desert floor.

programme.title: Destination Fear (S3)
programme.desc: Still reeling from a ghostly warning, Dakota and the team heads to one of America's deadliest prisons -- a place packed with tortured entities.

programme.title: American Monster (S2)
programme.desc: The Dowlings like to capture their kids' milestones on tape. But when Kevin is accused of a murder in a nearby town, his fate hangs on that same home camera.

programme.title: Expedition Unknown Specials- Global Game Show: Lost Civilizations
programme.desc: Josh Gates travels to Texas to quiz contestants on empires that vanished throughout history.

programme.desc: A mad bomber is on the loose and the bomb squad leader Col. Titus Varona (Cesar Montano) is at his wits' end.

programme.title: The Day After Valentine's
programme.desc: A woman should take the responsibility of helping a brokenhearted and self-destructive man to fix his problems.

programme.title: Sid & Aya (Not A Love Story)
programme.desc: It follows Sid (Dingdong Dantes) who suffers from insomnia and meets Aya (Anne Curtis) who he hires to accompany him in his sleepless nights.

programme.title: It's Cool Bulol
programme.desc: Red Sternberg stars as a campus nerd who has always been wanting to be accepted for what he is. He's smart, alright, but in an environment where substance takes a backseat to style, he is everybody's favorite laughingstock.

programme.title: Miss Granny
programme.desc: Fely is an elderly woman who finds second chance at youth after a visit to a mysterious photo studio.

programme.title: Booba
programme.desc: Rufa Mae stars in this comedy as Booba as she endeavors in the metropolis to fulfill her promise to her dying mother that she will find her jealous and insecure sister who run away from home.

programme.title: Angela Markado
programme.desc: Angela (Andi Eigenmann) seeks revenge on men who assaulted her and left her for dead.

programme.title: First Love
programme.desc: In what appears to be a serendipitous encounter upon saving the life of a stranger, the calculated and reserved businessman Nick (Aga Muhlach) meets the impulsive and optimistic photographer Ali (Bea Alonzo), who believes in destiny and carpe diem.

programme.title: Pusong Mamon
programme.desc: A funny heart warming story about three extraordinary people and their equally extraordinary relationship.

programme.title: Kainan Sa Highway
programme.desc: Kainan sa Highway is a story of survival, addiction for flesh and struggling for life.

programme.title: Ang Kabit Ni Mrs. Montero
programme.desc: Ang Kabit Ni Mrs. Montero tells the story of a young, beautiful wife (Patricia Javier) who’s wealthy but paraplegic husband (Edu Manzano) cannot provide her the physical intimacy she desires.

programme.title: Xenoa 2
programme.desc: XENOA 2 : Clash of the Bloods is the story of Clyde who suddenly discovers his power, being the son of Drix, one of the three Royal siblings from the planet Xenoa. The other siblings- Eli and Zeus learned that Clyde started to act strange and unfortunate things are happening around.

programme.title: Bang Bang Alley
programme.desc: A crime anthology that delves into the culture of violence infecting our society, Bang Bang Alley, features four stories brought to vivid life by musician/writer Ely Buendia, award winning director King Palisoc, and stage actor/director/playwright Yan Yuzon.

programme.title: Steal
programme.desc: When money is involved, trust is a big word. Four Filipinas based in Japan will learn the hard truth about money and trust as they get entangled in their own schemes.

programme.title: Cheers S3 E05 - Sam Turns The Other Cheek
programme.desc: The regulars of the Boston bar "Cheers" share their experiences and lives with each other while drinking or working at the bar where everybody knows your name.

programme.desc: Los Angeles homicide detective Lieutenant Columbo uses his humble ways and ingenuous demeanor to winkle out even the most well-concealed of crimes.However, beneath all that comical exterior was probably the most dogged investigator in the Los Angeles Police Department.

programme.title: Columbo S5 E06 - Last Salutecommodore

programme.title: CSI S3 E07 - Fight Night
programme.desc: The series enters its third season riding high as network television's top-rated drama. There is, therefore, no need for CBS to make any major cast changes, however, there are two significant additions to the cast lineup for season 3. A romantic interest is created for series regular Jorja Fox (Sara Sidle) in the form of Hank Peddigrew (Christopher Wiehl), a handsome paramedic. Also, recurring character Detective Lockwood ( Jeffrey D. Sams ) is seen on a more frequent basis. The season's most significant story development involves CSI head man Gil Grissom ( William L. Petersen ). After a few instances in which he notices that he is experiencing some hearing loss, Grissom is diagnosed with a hereditary disorder which threatens to culminate in total deafness. As the season draws to a close, Grissom undergoes surgery to correct this problem, however the results of the operation remain unclear until the beginning of season four.

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd (S1)
programme.desc: Sometimes the strangest things on Earth are happening just below its surface. These are the weird and wondrous tales of the sea beasts, hidden cities, and impossible creatures that lurk beneath us.

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid
programme.desc: In the Bible, there are two Arks, each designed by God himself. Both the Ark of the Covenant and Noah's Ark were built to protect but lost to history. Did either exist, and if so, where could they be?

programme.title: History's Greatest Heists With Pierce Brosnan (S1)
programme.desc: An elite crew of Italian thieves targets the vault of the Antwerp World Diamond Centre. After 27 months of planning, they execute their intricate plan and make off with more than $100 million.

programme.title: History's Greatest Of All Time With Peyton Manning (S1)
programme.desc: From GI Joe to the Slinky, host Peyton Manning counts down the top ten toys of all time, as voted by a panel of experts. Which one of your childhood favourites will be crowned the best of the best?

programme.title: Forged In Fire (S9)
programme.desc: In a new twist on the classic car challenge, four smiths create a knife from a mangled mess of a vehicle. After an intense round of testing, two smiths return home to recreate a set of curved katars.

programme.title: Kings Of Pain (S2)
programme.desc: Some of the most painful animals can be found in your own backyard. Rob and Adam take on an assassin bug, a Jerusalem cricket, and the brown widow spider - producing a record-setting episode of pain.

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid
programme.desc: In the Bible, there are two Arks, each designed by God himself. Both the Ark of the Covenant and Noah's Ark were built to protect but lost to history. Did either exist, and if so, where could they be?

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S24)
programme.desc: Things get scary when a seller comes in with a letter from Stephen King. Will all work and no play make Corey a dull boy? Then, Chum gets a sweet lesson when he checks out signed Steve Aoki merchandise.

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S2)

programme.title: Chanel
programme.desc: Discover the story of Chanel, the legendary brand which revolutionized world fashion, introducing comfortable luxury in women's wardrobe and creating timeless designs that are still popular today

programme.title: Roberta
programme.desc: Child actress Mumay Santiago gets her biggest break as she portrayed the title role in this remake of the Sampaguita Pictures' classic from the 50's. Roberta is a little girl forced to learn how to fend for herself because of her abusive and irresponsible father and ailing mother. When her mother died, Roberta is forced to live on the streets of the city where despite her many hardships, she managed to maintain a sunny disposition that enchants even strangers.

programme.title: Nestor Solis (Hari ng Oxo)
programme.desc: Manila in the 1970's. Society was restless and violence was a way of life. Efren Reyes Jr. is Nestor Solis, a former boxer who was driven by difficult circumstances to a life of crime.

programme.title: James Bone Agent 001
programme.desc: Ninong, the syndicate's big boss, is dead. There are three usurpers to the vacant throne--Crooked Fingers, Boy Macho and Sabrina. To settle the rivalry, they agree on the ultimate contest.

programme.title: Ang Pagbabalik ni Pedro Penduko (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Pedro Penduko (Janno Gibbs) who was decreed by a hermit as the savior of the world, which was under an evil curse. To fulfill his destiny, he had to go back in time and fight with the malevolent pair from hell, Lucifero and Lucifera.

programme.title: Lumaban Ka… Sagot Kita
programme.desc: Linette (Cherie Pie Picache) is an active student leader. She is frustrated that her boyfriend Dado (Julio Diaz) is apathetic towards the situation. But this will soon change.

programme.title: Pipti-Pipti (1 Por U, 2 Por Me)
programme.desc: Jack and Popoy were escaped convicts on the trail of twenty million pesos. Others were also in search of the money but the duo were lucky enough to elude them and discovered the loot buried in some remote town.

programme.title: Sana'y Wala Nang Wakas (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Three women united by friendship, music and fame. But much that celebrity brought them good things, it too, began to destroy them.

programme.title: Paano Ba Ang Magmahal?
programme.desc: Jun (Niño Muhlach) feels neglected as his parents do not have time for him. He leaves home and ends up staying with Dodie (Aga Muhlach). With Dodie, Jun finds the attention and love he wants. But all ends well as it turns out that Dodie's girlfriend is Millet (Pops Fernandez) who also happens to be the niece of Josie's colleague, Ramon (Dante Rivero).

programme.title: Bakit Kay Tagal Ng Sandali?
programme.desc: Nina (Dina Bonnevie) and Ted (Julio Diaz) are sweethearts. Ted convinces her to accept Don Edmundo's (Eddie Garcia) suit as the old man is said to be dying anyway.

programme.title: Neber 2-Geder
programme.desc: They were totally unlike in their ways and in the kind of girls they become attracted to. Andrew E and Redford White seemed like they were never together but each one was willing to do anything to help the other.

programme.title: Segurista
programme.desc: Made destitute by the eruption of Mount Pinatubo in Central Luzon, Karen decides to work as an insurance underwriter by day and as a guest relation’s officer in a club by night.

programme.title: Barumbado
programme.desc: A young hoodlum spawned and raised by a tough neighborhood goes out looking for love and an escape from the harsh realities of everyday life.

programme.title: Hiram Na Mukha
programme.desc: Famous plastic surgeon Dr. Hugo (Christopher de Leon) worships the ground his fiancee Alicia (Nanette Medved) walks on. That is because he feels Alicia is his creation.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Chatroom Japan
programme.desc: The number of traditional Japanese carpenters is dwindling, but American Jon Stollenmeyer is helping to keep their style of architecture alive.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: In 2024, Miyakoshi Akiko won a New York Times' Best Illustrated Children's Book Award. We see how she creates art, using charcoal and watercolors. And we discover the inspiration behind her work.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet two men in Shimane. In Unnan City, Korean Sanghyun uses local rice to brew makgeolli like it's done in his homeland. In Tamatsukuri Onsen, Nepalese Nandeshwar tends the front desk of an inn.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Masterpieces of Historic Capitals
programme.desc: Historic capitals in the Kansai region are home to a wealth of national treasures and masterpieces. Discover an array of artworks inspired by Buddhism, international trade, or the nobility.

programme.title: BOSAI
programme.desc: Shibuya is one of Japan's most famous tourist spots, but the low-lying city is also at risk of flooding and earthquakes. We'll look at Shibuya's advanced efforts to prepare for such disasters.

programme.title: Activate Your Japanese!
programme.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

programme.title: The Comedy Club Where I Belong
programme.desc: In a stand-up comedy club in Tokyo, people from all over the world try out bilingual jokes. For James from Australia, comedy has changed his life, helping him find a place where he feels he belongs.

programme.title: HELLO! NHK WORLD-JAPAN
programme.desc: We show how NHK WORLD-JAPAN's app now provides disaster alerts in 11 languages, including push notifications for earthquakes, tsunamis, and severe weather.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Seasoning the Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Darwin's Amazing Animals
programme.desc: An unlikely duel is about to take place with the "ocean's gangster" taking on a creature packing a most lethal punch. This bout, however, features fish out of water... and their fight to the finish!

programme.title: Time-lapse Journey
programme.desc: Mt. Fuji, the tallest mountain in Japan, has many faces. See the beauty of these different Fujis through time-lapse photography.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: An iconic story from bunraku puppet theatre features the legendary Princess Yaegaki. See how people living near the lake where the story is set work together to bring the tale back to its roots.

programme.title: Darwin's Amazing Animals
programme.desc: An unlikely duel is about to take place with the "ocean's gangster" taking on a creature packing a most lethal punch. This bout, however, features fish out of water... and their fight to the finish!

programme.title: Time-lapse Journey
programme.desc: Mt. Fuji, the tallest mountain in Japan, has many faces. See the beauty of these different Fujis through time-lapse photography.

programme.title: NHK NEWS 7
programme.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet two men in Shimane. In Unnan City, Korean Sanghyun uses local rice to brew makgeolli like it's done in his homeland. In Tamatsukuri Onsen, Nepalese Nandeshwar tends the front desk of an inn.

programme.title: Direct Talk

programme.title: Big Red Chicken Wake Up! / The Mystery Gift
programme.desc: Dora and Boots have to wake up the Big Red Chicken before he floats over a waterfall! // Dora and friends must solve a series of questions and challenges to open a mysterious gift.

programme.title: Big Rig Blaze
programme.desc: When a windstorm blows away the supplies for Stripes' Animal Party, Blaze transforms into the one Monster Machine strong enough to haul it all back - a Big Rig! There's nothing he can't pull with that Big Rig Force!

programme.title: Fwendsgiving Feast / Blueberry Crumble
programme.desc: Chef wants to make a special dish for every single friend coming to Fwendsgiving, but struggles to do it all in time. // The gang treks to The Other Side of the Fence so Olly can pick the first blueberry of the season.

programme.title: Green Around the Gills
programme.desc: Max is ready to go on his fun camping trip when Sharkdog comes down with a mysterious illness.

programme.title: A Storm in Foggy Springs
programme.desc: A terrible storm spooks Sharkdog and he gets loose, threatening to ruin Mom's TV interview.

programme.title: Poots and Vegetables
programme.desc: Max tries to find something that Sharkdog will eat that isn't fish.

programme.title: Splish Spashketball / The Slug Hank Redemption
programme.desc: Baby, Vola, and William head to Hydrospace to take on Shadow's team in the Splashketball Finals. // Detective Baby Shark and William Watson team up with Hank to help the Slobber Slug out of a jam.

programme.title: When You Wish Upon a Fish
programme.desc: Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze.

programme.title: Pups Save the Lost Penguin
programme.desc: Chickaletta switches places with a Baby Penguin.

programme.title: Pups vs. The Robo-Ducky
programme.desc: Digi and Tal get stuck on top of a giant Robo-Ducky.

programme.title: Pups Save a Show Jumper
programme.desc: Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog to enter in a frog-jumping contest and ends up needing rescued in a swamp.

programme.title: The Crew Celebrates Builder Covegiving Day / The Crew Builds A Rocket Ship Ride
programme.desc: After Speed Meister sabotages Builder Covegiving Day, it's up to the pups to save the holiday for everyone in Builder Cove. // Mix dreams about giving the moon a Mix makeover. Rubble and the pups make her dream a reality with a new boardwalk ride!

programme.title: The Camper Van
programme.desc: Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: The Queen
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit is to be given the Queen's Award for Industry, and Peppa and her friends are to accompany her to the palace to meet the Queen!

programme.title: Desert Island
programme.desc: When a fishing trip goes wrong, leaving Grandpa Pig, Granddad Dog, and Grampy Rabbit stranded on a desert island, Captain Daddy Dog is the only one able to save them.

programme.title: Perfume
programme.desc: After smelling Granny Pig's perfume de lavender, Peppa experiments with the flowers in the garden to create her own special smell.

programme.title: Bubu's Robot
programme.desc: Bubu is understandably thrilled when he discovers his old toy robot that he converts into the FIX-IT-UP 5000. Anna, Froga, and Christopher are so impressed with his new fixer-upper robot, Bubu begins to think his friends like his robot more than him!

programme.title: Froga's Choice
programme.desc: Froga can't decide which boots to wear for today's group photo with her friends. Anna, Ron, and Bubu try to help her decide, but it makes her decision-making more difficult!

programme.title: Cinnamon Buns / Soufflé
programme.desc: For Chef's birthday, Chef and Olly follow clues on a journey that leads to a delicious surprise. // When a rumor spreads that Chef can't make a soufflé, he is determined to show he can.

programme.title: Opera Cake
programme.desc: After learning Ruby is an amazing opera singer, Chef tries to bake a delicate Opera cake while Olly noisily builds a stage for a Stump concert.

programme.title: T-Rex Trouble
programme.desc: Blaze and Zeg are in Dinosaur Valley, showing off their amazing robot powers to their dinosaur friends. But when they discover three lost little Tyrannosauruses, they must use their robot powers to get the babies home safely.

programme.title: The Snowflake Games
programme.desc: It's a head-to-head showdown when Blaze and Crusher enter... The Snowflake Games! Who will win the most winter sports and receive the prized Snowflake Medal?

programme.title: Pups Save the Lost Penguin
programme.desc: Chickaletta switches places with a Baby Penguin.

programme.title: Pups vs. The Robo-Ducky
programme.desc: Digi and Tal get stuck on top of a giant Robo-Ducky.

programme.title: Pups Save the Mountain Surfers / Pups Save Humdinger's Home Away From Home
programme.desc: Zuma and Hurricane Harrigan are about to go kitesurfing when a mighty wind sweeps them off the beach. // Mayor Humdinger takes his trailer and his kitties out for a sunny, desert vacation.

programme.title: Pups Save the Carnival
programme.desc: Cornelius has escaped from the pig ride at the carnival, and the prizes have gone missing too!

programme.title: The Crew Builds An Indoor Skydiving Center / The Crew Builds A Roller Rink
programme.desc: Mayor Greatway and Mr. Ducky-Doo want to show their skydiving skills. But when wind gets in the way, the pups help them sky dive on the ground! // When Wheeler and Truffles the pig can't ice skate, the crew finds a construction solution with wheels!

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Bowling Alley / The Crew Builds A Superbloom Path
programme.desc: Rubble & the pups find Grandpa Gravel's lucky bowling ball. Too bad Builder Cove doesn't have a bowling alley... until now! // When a sudden superbloom traps Motor, Lily, and Park Ranger Rose, the pups need a flower-friendly construction solution.

programme.title: Croc-A-Bye Baby / Wanna Eampañada? / If The Boot Fits / Piñata Party
programme.desc: Dora and Boots babysit some rowdy crocs. // Dora and Boots get the Troll to try an empanada at Benny's stand. // Boots tries new wacky new boots that Tico invented. // The twins have their first piñata party, but no one can figure out how to open it.

programme.title: Picture Imperfect / The Fishy Friends Talent Show
programme.desc: Baby accidentally gets messy on family picture day, and goes to extraordinary lengths to get clean before his parents find out. // Penny and Wallace team up to perform in a two-fishy talent show.

programme.title: Sharkdog Sitting
programme.desc: While Max is out Olivia babysits Sharkdog but she just can't keep him inside.

programme.title: Fish Fiesta Freakout
programme.desc: Everyone's excited for the Foggy Springs carnival, but it's getting more and more difficult to keep Sharkdog a secret.

programme.title: Sharkdog, Family
programme.desc: When the town discovers Sharkdog, Max needs to convince everyone that he's not a monster.

programme.title: The Children's Fete
programme.desc: The school roof is leaky again, so the children organize a fair to raise money for a new roof.

programme.title: The Aquarium
programme.desc: Goldie the Goldfish is feeling a little lonely, so Peppa takes her to the aquarium.

programme.title: George's Racing Car
programme.desc: It's a beautiful day, but Peppa, George, Daddy Pig, and Grandpa Pig are sitting inside watching racecar driving on television!

programme.title: The Little Boat
programme.desc: Daddy Pig is left behind when everyone takes Grampy Rabbit's boat to the riverside picnic spot. Will someone remember him and save him some cake?

programme.title: Daddy Pig's Office
programme.desc: Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pig’s office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbit’s job is all about numbers, Mrs Cat‘s job is all about drawing shapes on the computer, and Daddy Pig’s job is complicated.

programme.title: George's Birthday
programme.desc: Today is George’s birthday and Mummy and Daddy Pig have a special day planned. George gets a new Brontosaurus toy and the family go to the museum to see lots of different dinosaurs.

programme.title: Tiny Creatures
programme.desc: Peppa and George are playing in Grandpa Pig's garden when they find a little snail. Then Grandpa also shows them his beehive.

programme.title: The Sports Day
programme.desc: It is Sports Day at Peppa’s playgroup. There are lots of exciting events, including running, jumping and the “tug of war”. Daddy Pig tells Peppa that it’s not the winning that matters.

programme.title: Barbazoo Can't Say ''No'' / The Doppelganger
programme.desc: Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.desc: Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: Going Boating

programme.title: The Long Grass

programme.title: Zoe Zebra, the Postman's Daughter

programme.title: Painting

programme.title: Youthful China
programme.desc: The youth of a country is the future of that country. A series of documentaries focusing on the younger generation of China in which you get to see what they are achieving and what makes them tick!

programme.title: Pixel Collage
programme.desc: A well-crafted collage of selected short documentaries telling stories about all aspects of China! People, technology, culture, and wildlife, all are showcased in Internet-friendly form.

programme.title: Today’s Top Pick
programme.desc: Documentaries in this slot are rebroadcasts of our most-viewed and most popular stories of the season. They feature important social, economic, environmental or other policy-driven issues, affecting lives nationwide or simply in one small village. A broad selection of top productions by Chinese top documentary producers.

programme.title: Humanities and Geography
programme.desc: A strand devoted to the nature and wildlife of China, the people who lived alongside them, and the great and diverse landscapes with which they all contend.

programme.title: Living China
programme.desc: Real life stories told from the personal perspective. Moving, dramatic, sorrows and joys, expressed emphatically and expressed quietly. Watch closely to see and understand the real China as it is lived.

programme.title: Special Edition
programme.desc: Prestige Chinese documentary production, tackling serious subjects with the best cinematography, editing, and all round production values with a unique Chinese perspective.

programme.title: Journeys and Discoveries
programme.desc: A documentary series showcasing the history of China and its people.

programme.title: History in the Frame
programme.desc: A documentary series featuring historical and archaeological exploration.

programme.title: Best Eats
programme.desc: Food connects people! A feast for the eyes that spotlights the cuisines of China in a way that’s bound to set the mouths of the whole globe watering!

programme.desc: After the death of his brother, an expert street dancer goes to Georgia to attend Truth University. But his efforts to get an education and woo the girl he likes are sidelined when he joins in his fraternity's effort to win a step dancing competition.

programme.desc: Lara Croft (Jolie) is back in action and faces her most perilous mission: to recover what ancient civilization believed to be the essence of all evil, Pandora's Box.

programme.title: Children Of A Lesser God
programme.desc: Based on the hit Broadway play, it’s the uplifting love story of John Leeds, an idealistic special education teacher, and a headstrong deaf girl named Sarah. Soon their teacher/student relationship blossoms into love.

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: The life story of heavyweight boxing champion Muhammad Ali, following the champ's early days as Cassius Clay and his rise in sports and politics, including his controversial refusal to fight in the Vietnam War and his infamous comeback battles.

programme.title: Asia First
programme.desc: Top stories, business news and market updates from across the region as Asia gears up for the day ahead.

programme.title: Hidden Histories
programme.desc: Together with historians, insiders and experts, we follow in the footsteps of our ancestors and delve deep into our past, to unpack the trivia hidden behind facades.

programme.title: Asia Now
programme.desc: Non-stop breaking stories, expert analysis and extensive news coverage every hour.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: With a fresh approach to tackling the issues of the day, Talking Point investigates a current issue or event, offering different perspectives to local stories and reveals how it all affects you.

programme.title: Asia Now
programme.desc: Non-stop breaking stories, expert analysis and extensive news coverage every hour.

programme.title: Fact Vs. Fiction
programme.desc: Why has fake news become an industry in India? We traverse India to meet internet trolls, to understand the financial and ideological reasons that that compel them into becoming agents of misinformation.

programme.title: Headline News
programme.desc: The latest top stories of the hour.

programme.title: Insight
programme.desc: Insight investigates and analyses topical issues that impact Asia and the rest of the world.

programme.title: East Asia Tonight
programme.desc: Spotlight on East Asia, a region steeped in history and now helping to write the future of our world. We'll break down the key stories and explain why they matter

programme.title: Money Mind
programme.desc: Money Mind is all about how to save, how to invest, and how to better spend your money. Your weekly personal finance tips to make all the right money moves in Asia. Because, personal finance matters.

programme.title: On The Red Dot
programme.desc: Rozz goes to Taiwan to meet Jimmy Lim, the first Singaporean chef to achieve three Michelin stars. Discover how Jimmy elevates Singaporean dishes using Taiwanese ingredients and cultural influences.

programme.title: Asia Tonight
programme.desc: CNA correspondents bring you the top stories of the day with 'live' reports and interviews to keep you up-to-date on the day’s events.

programme.title: Echoes Of Change
programme.desc: A new generation of Vietnamese carves a future they want to own. They're empowering rural communities, and weaving tradition into progress. What will it take to define success on their own terms?

programme.desc: From business to politics, health to technology, the latest news from Singapore and analysis of the impact.
